statements: DELETE FROM swim_meet_registration WHERE participant_name = 'Alice' AND event_name = '100m Freestyle';
DELETE FROM swim_meet_registration WHERE participant_age > 18 AND event_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM events WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 100 AND age > 25
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-07-01' AND location IS NULL
DELETE FROM meet_entries WHERE meet_id = 1 AND participant_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM meets WHERE meet_location = 'New York' AND meet_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM event WHERE event_distance > 10 AND event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM registration WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM registrations WHERE participant_id = 10 AND event_id = 3 AND registration_date = '2022-01-15 10:00:00';
